price: 76. Yalli isi naqoosak isi diinil tirri iyye marah Ion tirtot tirto keenih ossa, kaadu meqe taamoomiy abe numuh aracal Raqta is Nabiyow ku-Rabbih xaqul akeeral aysuk raqtaah gacim kee ellecabô maqaaneh aysuk raqta jannatal.
arabic: وَيَزِيدُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱهۡتَدَوۡاْ هُدٗىۗ وَٱلۡبَٰقِيَٰتُ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتُ خَيۡرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٞ مَّرَدًّا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wayazīdu al-lahu alladhīna ih'tadaw hudan wal-bāqiyātu al-ṣāliḥātu khayrun ʿinda rabbika thawāban wakhayrun maraddan
